subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic moved relentlessly into the Indian Wells semi-finals with a 6-2, 6-4 victory over the Frenchman Richard Gasquet, extending his perfect record this season to 16-0.
snippet: Novak Djokovic moved relentlessly into the Indian Wells semi-finals with a 6-2, 6-4 victory over the Frenchman Richard Gasquet, extending his perfect record this season to 16-0.
